name: Thunderbirds Are Go
summary: Zero-X, a manned exploration mission crashes during lift-off on its maiden flight. Two years later an investigative committee finally concludes sabotage, and decides to call on the services of International Rescue to oversee security at the impending second launch. The second Zero-X successfully reaches its destination, but encounters unexpected hazards, ultimately leading to another call for assistance on its return to Earth. International Rescue respond, and once again Thunderbirds are GO!
info:
• 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 1966年12月12日（英国）、1967年7月15日（日本）
  • 片长: 93分钟
  • 导演: David Lane
  • 制作: Century 21 Cinema(AP Films)、Associated Television
